Package tetris.boards.modernTetris

Class ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics

java.lang.Object
tetris.boards.Board
tetris.boards.BoardWithPhysics
tetris.boards.modernTetris.ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
Direct Known Subclasses:
SenderModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
public class ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics extends BoardWithPhysics
A concrete implementation of a playable board using Modern Tetris rules.

Key features of this implementation include:

  • Hold Piece: Players can swap the falling piece with a stored one using TetrominoHolder.
  • Super Rotation System (SRS): Uses standard wall-kick data defined in SuperRotationSystem.
  • 7-Bag Generator: Ensures a balanced distribution of pieces.
  • Garbage System: Can receive garbage lines from opponents and add them to the grid.
  • Gravity Scaling: Implements a specific gravity curve defined in ModernTetrisConfig.

  • Method Details

    • hold

      public void hold()
      Attempts to swap the current piece with the held piece. Delegates to TetrominoHolder.hold(tetris.tetrominoes.Tetromino).

    • addGarbage

      public void addGarbage(byte numberOfGarbageRows, byte emptyGarbageColumn)
      Queues garbage lines to be added to the board.
      Parameters:
      numberOfGarbageRows - Count of rows to add.
      emptyGarbageColumn - Column index for the hole.

    • update

      public void update()
      Main update loop.

      Updates physics (via super) and then processes any pending garbage lines. If adding garbage forces blocks off the top of the screen, the game ends.

      Overrides:
      update in class Board
